oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spirit of the Farm market reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Periodicals; Farming; Farm produce; Livestock; Meteorology
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Market results for produce, seeds, wool, cotton, tobacco, flour, grain, hay, and livestock. Also included is a meteorological chart depicting temperature and rainfall.

"The Spirit of the Farm," a weekly journal devoted to agriculture and livestock, was published in Nashville from 1883 to 1886. The editor was B. M. Hord. This journal is a typical Progressive-era farm publication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Spirit of the Farm Publishing Company
